document.title: Relationship Between Usage and Age: How LGBT Individuals Use Online Social Networking Applications For Personal Relationships

disciplines.discipline: Gender, Race, Sexuality, and Ethnicity in Communication

document.abstract: A pilot study titled "Relationship Between Usage and Age: How LGBT Individuals Use Online Social Networking Applications For Personal Relationships" that looks at the impact of online social networking applications and how they are changing the way LGBT seek and develop personal relationships.
document.publication-title: Annual Research Symposium of the College of Communication and Information
